metadata.title: CVE-2017-14121 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The DecodeNumber function in unrarlib.c in unrar 0.0.1 (aka unrar-free orunrar-gpl) suffers from a NULL pointer dereference flaw triggered by acrafted RAR archive. NOTE: this may be the same as one of the several testcases in the CVE-2017-11189 references.

criterions.comment: unrar-free: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
